Package org.restlet.ext.jaxrs Description

Support for JAX-RS API. Java XML for RESTful web services (JAX-RS) 2.0 provides a common way to develop RESTful web APIs on the server side. Limited client side support is also available.
Since:
Restlet 1.1
Author:
Stephan Koops
See Also:
JAX-RS Web site, User Guide - JAX-RS extension
